title: Politics of Developing Areas
description: A detailed survey of the domestic politics of developing countries from a comparative perspective. Assessment of theories of development with appropriate examples taken from particular areas and countries. Repeatable to 8 units with different subtitles (e.g., 'Latin America,' 'East Asia,' 'Africa'). The Schedule of Classes will list topic selected. 4 lectures.
prerequisites: POLS 225 or POLS 229, or consent of instructor
